channel.title: Comments on: An Important Message From Comcast

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/11/12/an-important-message-from-comcast/#comment-3575">Raief</a>.
Yes, I've chatted with them about it. They are still looking into it.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Raief.

Yes, I’ve chatted with them about it. They are still looking into it.

item.title: By: Raief
item.dc:creator: Raief
item.description: Did you contact them about the overkill? Waste? It is really a terrible waste of resources and of peoples time. It does keep the postal employees working, and their own people employed, but at what environmental costs? I use Comcast, but do not remember them mailing me any letters other than bills. Did you check off that you wanted everything sent to you by mail? I do not even use their email so I have very little contact with them other than their Internet service.
item.content:encoded:
Did you contact them about the overkill? Waste?
It is really a terrible waste of resources and of peoples time.
It does keep the postal employees working, and their own people employed, but at what environmental costs?
I use Comcast, but do not remember them mailing me any letters other than bills.
Did you check off that you wanted everything sent to you by mail?
I do not even use their email so I have very little contact with them other than their Internet service.
